preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 30.0 g of Barium Sulfide (BaS) using a precision scale.
2. Measure 60.0 g of Cerium Sulfide (Ce2S3).
3. Measure 10.0 g of Antimony Sulfide (Sb2S3).
4. In a clean, dry mortar and pestle, combine all ingredients thoroughly to ensure a uniform mixture.
